---
title: "Overview"
description:
  "SDF Cloud is an integrated, auto-generated data catalog with integrated column level lineage, data classification, and more."
---

SDF Cloud is the fastest way to understand your data warehouse at a glance. Code-driven assets are searchable and clear, driving
data awareness across a whole organization. Visualize column level lineage, data classifications, and reports at a glance.

Assets are generated automatically through static analysis, so there is no configuration, migration, or setup time. It. Just. Works.

</Frame>
